comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content:
The quadruple wing Friedrichshafen FF 54. As it was never acquired by the iDFlieg (Inspektion der Fliegertruppe) it never acquired an official D identification. The machine had only the factory identification FF 54. 
Comparing this picture to another side view of the same machine shows a difference in the tail / rudder section. There was probably some active development to improve the in flight stability of the machine.
